name: Friends For The Apocalypse
description:
Inspired by games like Smash TV and UBERMOSH. FFTA is a top-down action arena zombie survival base defense game. Control both man and dog as you work together to survive on a zombie infested procedural island.



  • Survive alongside your trusty K-9, hotswapping between both characters.
  • Utilize different tools and weapons including your shotgun, assault rifle, sniper rifle, flamethrower and even bear traps.
  • Command your loyal pet to sit, stay, speak and attack. Command your loyal human to run, gun and craft!
  • Randomly generating map elements mix up combat on every run.
  • Slow down time to increase reaction speed or just get out of a bad situation.
  • Manage your campsite, upgrade your skills and keep your dog happy!
  • Survive as long as you can and upload your score to see how you rank on the Steam Leaderboards.



  • Handcrafted pixel art with a retro SNES feel.
  • Original 8-bit chip tune soundtrack.
  • Compete competitively worldwide on the Steam Leaderboards.
  • Compete casually locally with Steam Cloud stats.
  • Integrated indie dev support!

Thank you for your support! All purchases and donations go directly towards funding future projects. Feel free to add any comments or suggestions in our forums.

~BrainChocolate
